append.xpath: /blocks/block[starts-with(@name, 'cntFootlocker') or starts-with (@name,'cntCabinet') or starts-with (@name,'cntCupboard') or starts-with (@name,'counterHollow') or starts-with (@name,'cntCounter') and not(contains(@name, 'Player'))]
/blocks/block[starts-with(@name, 'cntbasketLaundryEmpty') or starts-with (@name,'cntbinTrashRolling') or starts-with (@name,'cntBinTrashPlasticEmpty') and not(contains(@name, 'Player'))]
